comments:
1. Use large resource support (discovered using Cloudscape).
2. Import to log files and select a new correlation.

When clicking finish the first time, the dialog does not close and an exception 
is out put to the .log file.  After the second time, the dialog closes and one 
can view the new correlation in the log view.  The exception produced is.
